column6: "EARN YOUR WINGS" PART 3 (OF 3) It's the Exiles vs. the Fantastic Four and Namor in an all-out slugfest that will leave our reality-hopping heroes altered! The Exiles' lineup changes once again, but not in the way you expect!
column8: | writer:Tony Bedard | colorist:Jung Choi | penciller (cover):Mizuki Sakakibara
